To fight, in honor of their legacy, the legacy of the 20 first-graders and 6 staffers murdered at Sandy Hook. 

To fight for gun safety policies‚Äîfor life-saving policies‚Äî that will keep our families together, our children safe, and our homes full of deafening hope.

Today, on the 10th anniversary of the tragedy at Sandy Hook, we are left with the memories of our loved ones and the lost dreams of what could have been. 

And today, we are left with an unwavering determination and an unrelenting resolve to fight for the lives of our children.

Now, in all of our homes, we are left with silence. 

Silence in the picture frames on the mantle. 
Silence in the empty chair at the table. 
Silence from the bike gathering dust in the garage. 

Parents move forward. But they never fully heal. 

The silence makes sure of that.

A decade ago, my child was murdered. 

Three weeks later, 10 years ago today, 26 more were gunned down in Sandy Hook.

"How can you find joy when happiness feels like a betrayal of the only one you've loved more than life itself?"

The love a parent has for our children is different. It is a unique love, an all-consuming love. A love that flows through your soul with all the fear that comes with it.

The American SAFER Act would:

1. rescind the 100-air-mile-14-day limitation.
2. restrict DHS from implementing any more distance rules.
3. require all aliens who procured admission through fraud or w/o valid docs, and have been present > 2 years, be processed through ER.

5/5

NOW, ER only applies to:

1. Arriving aliens at US ports of entry.
2. Aliens who entered by sea, without being admitted or paroled, who have been here less than 2 years.
3. Aliens apprehended within 100 air miles of the border and within 14 days of entering the America.

4/5

Previous Admins have neutered this policy.

For example, when Clinton first implemented ER, it applied the authority only to ‚Äúarriving aliens‚Äù.

3/5

Codified at INA ¬ß 235(b)(1), ER allows DHS to remove aliens anywhere in America who haven't been admitted or paroled into the US, if such aliens have been physically present fewer than 2 years and procured their admission through fraud or didn't obtain valid documents.

2/5

The American SAFER Act.
